com.cscguru.client.ui

Class Gui

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscguru.client.ui.Gui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClickable, IDrawable

    public class Gui
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDrawable, IClickable
    Handles the gui elements of the game.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gui(ResourceManager rm, Cycle c, Player p, Log log)
      Constructs a GUI object to handle most of the drawing of the user interface and keeps a reference of the camera object.
